articles.description: In a fun chat with Lasith Malinga, Royals head coach Kumar Sangakkara picked the Indian great to bat for his life and said he's "unbelievable" in that role.
articles.content: Rajasthan Royals' director of cricket and head coach Kumar Sangakkara had a fun chat with fast bowling coach Lasith Malinga as the two long-time friends discussed a bunch of topics on Thursday. From … [+2398 chars]

articles.title: Player Ratings: Real Madrid 0 - 0 Real Betis; 2022 La Liga - Managing Madrid
articles.description: Ancelotti gave his gala XI a run out ahead of the UCL final.
articles.content: The last match of the season felt like a summer friendly, Thibaut Courtois admitted as much after match, but Carlo Ancelotti wanted to give his starters as much preparation as possible ahead of the C… [+2368 chars]
